de.awi.floenavigation.services

Class AngleCalculationService

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.Context
      • android.content.ContextWrapper
        • android.app.Service
          • android.app.IntentService
            • de.awi.floenavigation.services.AngleCalculationService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2

    public class AngleCalculationService
extends android.app.IntentService
    An IntentService subclass for handling asynchronous task requests in a service on a separate handler thread.

    AngleCalculationService class is used to calculate DatabaseHelper.beta at regular intervals from all the fixed stations w.r.t the origin and subsequently calculate the corresponding coordinates in the grid

    TODO: Customize class - update intent actions and extra parameters.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private double averageBetaCalculation(double[] beta)
      To calculate average of the values present in beta
      private void betaAngleCalculation(android.database.sqlite.SQLiteDatabase db)
      This function is called from onHandleIntent(Intent) beta angle is calculated from all the fixed stations DatabaseHelper.fixedStationTable w.r.t the origin fixed station mmsi by subtracting alpha from angle theta, which is the angle between the axis connecting origin and the fixed station and the longitudinal axis For origin fixed station beta is not calculated Each beta calculated is stored in each index of beta Further the beta angles are averaged and stored in the database DatabaseHelper.betaTable
      static boolean getStopRunnable() 
      void onCreate()
      onCreate method of the activity lifecycle used to register the broadcastReceiver and to receive the gpsTime
      void onDestroy()
      onDestroy method of the activity life cycle used to unregister the broadcastReceiver
      protected void onHandleIntent(android.content.Intent intent)
      This method is invoked on the worker thread Runnable is initialized to run every 10000 msecs In the runnable task, base stations which are used for initial grid setup are stored in mmsi for further calculations
      static void setStopRunnable(boolean runnable)
      function called from SetupActivity.runServices(Context) SyncActivity.stopServices()
      private void updateDataintoDatabase(android.database.sqlite.SQLiteDatabase db, double beta)
      Updates the database table DatabaseHelper.betaTable with the averaged beta value

        protected void onHandleIntent(android.content.Intent intent)

      • betaAngleCalculation

        private void betaAngleCalculation(android.database.sqlite.SQLiteDatabase db)
        This function is called from onHandleIntent(Intent) beta angle is calculated from all the fixed stations DatabaseHelper.fixedStationTable w.r.t the origin fixed station mmsi by subtracting alpha from angle theta, which is the angle between the axis connecting origin and the fixed station and the longitudinal axis For origin fixed station beta is not calculated Each beta calculated is stored in each index of beta Further the beta angles are averaged and stored in the database DatabaseHelper.betaTable
        Parameters:
        db - SQLiteDatabase object

        Returns:
        returns the averaged value
